entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this morning and risk of freezing rain. Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
